website_summaries.verdict: A precise and accurate toddler scale that is ideal for measuring minute changes in your baby's weight.
pros: Tare function enables you to deduct weight of towel or baby clothes for the most accurate estimate
Easily toggles between pounds and ounces
Responsive touch pad that's easy to read
cons: It goes through batteries more quickly than the other scales

customer_reviews.title: Baby scale that is good for small animals, but very hard on batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to weigh foster kittens. It is great. Very superior to my old one. Weighs quickly, gives a stable weight, and weighs small kittens (under two pounds) as accurately as a scale made for weights under 5 pounds. After using the scale for seven months, I have to downgrade the scale. The issue is not accuracy, it is the very short battery life. I'm already on the second battery change. The scale uses a tiny button-type battery that just isn't up to the demand of frequent use. I own and heavily use a kitchen scale and our bathroom scale, and batteries last years in these units. If you get this scale, lay in a supply of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Reassurance for a nursing mother!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to weigh our newborn and make sure that breastfeeding is going well. The digital touch pad is responsive and works well. As far as using it to weigh a newborn or wiggling baby who is pretty mellow with most things EXCEPT being weighed... it gets the job done. It's not a hospital grade scale and the weight measurement is a bit off from what we get at the doctors. As a nursing mother it is nice to see the numbers going up. It's about half a pound give or take but again this is weighing a baby who at no point in the process lays still. I'd recommend it and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bozfam

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact make/model used by my vet. Reading on my new scale matches exactly with the reading on the vet's scale. I have two older cats, both with health issues, and accurately monitoring their weights is essential. This scale is perfect and neither cat objects to being weighed (at least not at home!).
customer_reviews.author: Perpetually-Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to weigh cats at a vet clinic! Work great! Easy to clean. The baby on the front of the box is flipping his middle finger but that just gave us all a good laugh.
customer_reviews.author: bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly accurate
customer_reviews.text: The switch on the bottom is a bit cumbersome if you are already holding baby. But this scale is extremely accurate for measuring weighted feeds. I "calibrated" it using a few bottle feeds to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: They seem to like it, it's comfy to sit on and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Weighing my big kitties on it. They seem to like it, it's comfy to sit on and I can read their weight:) They love to eat so I have to watch them...
customer_reviews.author: Sammys

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This scale is lightweight, does a great job for weighing small animals, easy to carry around
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne White

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I even keep an eye on my cats ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this scale for foster kittens. It works great. I even keep an eye on my cats to make sure they aren't gaining weight.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not usable for infant or babies
customer_reviews.text: If you are planning to use this scale for your infant, not recommended as the scale gives incorrect and confusing weight when used for infants. Wouldn’t recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: eAbed

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this scale seems to be fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this scale seems to be fairly precise. With a moving baby, it usually shows the same weight. We have been weighing our baby on it for over a month and weigh her 2 times before her bath and the weight is almost always consistent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Berkovich

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste  your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, horrible hunk of junk. No accuracy, get different weights within minutes of previous weighing. I even changed the battery hoping that would help. Nope. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and exactly what my daughter wanted for her baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Robles

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: After using for several months, the weight scale became inaccurate even after replacing the batteries
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: look for another better option
customer_reviews.text: used product, the box was open and broken, the scale dirty and used.
customer_reviews.author: EAce

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastfeeding moms that want to check on how much milk baby gets.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is exactly was I was looking for--easy to use and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: MSUJen

customer_reviews.title: Baby scale
customer_reviews.text: We use this at the minimum weekly for growth monitoring for our baby and we love it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This scale does what it is supposed to and does it well. I just wish it took AAA or AA batteries instead of a button cell.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F.

customer_reviews.title: Scale doesn't work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The scale doesn't work!! It powers up but doesn't display any weight when u place an item on it!!!! I need a replacement or a refund!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: leroy

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: got the scale in time so i’m happy about that, went ahead and gave it a few test tries pretty accurate happy about that as well
customer_reviews.author: Dabrieon

customer_reviews.title: Not useful to me
customer_reviews.text: Said it weighs in lbs AND oz. weighs in lbs OR oz. not useful for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Animal Hospital Scale
customer_reviews.text: Great scale for the price, we use this for our little fur babies in our hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Foreman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can not get it to work. Changed batteries. Read direvtions. Changed surfaces. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: tamm fumarola

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a pet scale. It is simple to use, with the option to set to metric or pounds. It comes on quickly, and then shuts off automatically after a time after removing the child or pet being weighed. It sits very low so my pet doesn't feel strange on it. The scale locks in on a weight when it determines an accurate weight has been determined. It seems very accurate. I tried multiple weighings in a row and got the exact same weight each time. I am very pleased this scale, it is much better than I anticipated for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Accurate scale. The five stars is really for whoever designed the box. Funniest thing I’ve seen in some time
customer_reviews.author: Robert Luffman

customer_reviews.title: This product works really well, sometimes. We've already ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well, sometimes. We've already had to replace the battery twice, & we purchased only seven weeks ago. It started giving us inconsistent readings for the past month. First time we noticed it, we switch the battery & it fixed it. Second time, we are still getting inconsistencies even after replacing the battery again. If you put a 5 lb weight on it, it will show 4.92, 4.76, & 4.31 back-to-back readings. Unreliable. For the price of this scale, the return eligibility should be more than one month given it starts messing up at that time. Very upset that I cannot return even for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: AMG, Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: our newborn was having major issues gainig weight, buying this scale gave us such piece of mind, very quality!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN J HERRING

customer_reviews.title: I like the button that locks the weight so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the scale to weigh my doggies and kitties. It works perfectly and reliably. I like the button that locks the weight so I can remove the animal before trying to read the weight. The tare button is nice for adding a grip pad or blanket before placing the pet on the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Not as accurate as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Got this this scale to use for transfer weights (weight after feed - weight before feed = amount of milk eaten from breast). Unfortunately the weights it measured varied by up to 2 oz from weighing to weighing, making it basically useless for transfer weights. The accuracy is supposed to be 0.2 oz, not 2 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for general weighing, not sensitive weighing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scale to do weighted feeds with my newborn. It works properly about 20% of the time. I would return it if we hadn’t thrown out the box.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for low weight gain
customer_reviews.text: My baby had low weight gain requiring frequent doctor visits. Having a home scale gave us peace of mind in knowing that he was getting enough breast milk (weighing pre and post feeding) and any time between visits we were concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for weighing small animals!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our clinic for weighing cats and small dogs. As long as it's sitting on a level hard surface (no carpets or towels underneath), it appears to be accurate and very easy to use. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michaden

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my sickly cat.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my sickly cat to monitor her weight. Sometimes she gets mad and won’t sit still but the scale does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: No weight concerns, this is for you
customer_reviews.text: Works, ish. If you are looking for precise ounce weights for breastfeeding baby then this probably isn't the scale for you. The numbers changed every single time I tried baby on it even one after another in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Works but not very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Works. Not the most accurate. Switch between lbs and kg doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: alex bromage

customer_reviews.title: Reliable reading!!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. I get a consistent weight measurement from it when done in a row. I bought this to weigh my twins so I can keep track of their weight gain while nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Chasitie McGuire

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Works great . We are using it at an animal hospital . It gets used all throughout the day . It is really light and easy to carry and works well .
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: That makes it useless to me
customer_reviews.text: This scale is supposed to be sensitive to 5 grams. It's not. It won't even recognize an added half ounce which is more than 14 grams. So, I would say it is sensitive to 15 grams, but definitely not 5. That makes it useless to me. The seller offered to send me another one. I will try that one and update if it is any better. But, for now, I am sticking with 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: It does give weights in increments of 5g, but ...
customer_reviews.text: It does give weights in increments of 5g, but it is very sensitive to movement, and to the surface it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Leguia

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale. It has been very accurate compared with the Dr. office scale. The only negative is that the switch to change between kg/lb/oz is on the bottom and can't be done while weighing your baby. The Dr. wanted kg, but I wanted to see lb/oz... it is extremely inconvenient switch.
customer_reviews.author: Evie R.

customer_reviews.title: This scale is phenomenal. I weigh my baby every ...
customer_reviews.text: This scale is phenomenal. I weigh my baby every week and it is very accurate/similar to the one used in the pediatrician's office. She is a preemie and her weight gain needs to be closely monitored.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has oz, lbs and kg. Very easy to use and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: S&J Haughey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This scale works great for my little baby. We are watching his weight really close and it is so nice having a scale at home.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable baby scale
customer_reviews.text: I use this baby scale in my business. Portable and accurate. Perfect for weighing babies in kilograms and pounds and ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Blanton-Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: Scale is just what I expected. I am using it to weigh my standard dachshund instead of traveling to the pet store. It seems accurate. I weighed a new bag of dog food on it and it was on the money. My dog's weigh ins have been consistent and I like that it is easy to operate. It is slippery for my dog, so I place a small blanket on it and tare it first and he doesn't seem to mind. I recommend this scale and the seller. Product shipped quick and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: HAVE to knock it down points for baby shooting the BIRD on packaging! WTF???
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: This was gift from my dad when we had our baby. It's worked well to keep track of how our daughter is growing. It needs to be on a perfectly flat surface or it seems to glitch.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn

product_meta.title: AFENDO Electronic Digital Smoothing Infant, Baby and Toddler Scale -White
product_meta.description:
Warranty 
18 months warranty, 30 days unconditional returns & exchanges , Answer to customer's queries within 24 hours (Customer Service). 
Easy to read 
The toddler/ child scale is specially designed for baby, with the function of locking weight mandatory and tare weight, equipped with a high precision “Strain-Gauge” sensor, reading is easy and stable. 

Prompts Functions 
LCD will make prompt when insufficient voltage, overload or error, you can always easily master the working state of the baby scale. 

Long Standby 
Powered by 1 of CR2032 lithium battery, prolong the standby time, energy-saving and environmental. 

Environment Materials 
Adopting environment high polymer and strength ABS material, the baby scale will not emit any odor, more safer and healthier, effectively protects the internal parts security. 

Specifications 
Power supply: 1xCR2032 battery (included) 
High precision strain gauge sensor system 
Capacity:20 kgs 
Size: 22.04*12.99*2.08 inch (L*W*H) 
Minimum scale: 5g 
Weight Unit: kg/lb/oz 
Open Mode: Automatic balance
feature_bullets: The surface of infant scale is streamlined grooves shaped bearing surface which conform with human ergonomic design, so that the baby weighs more comfortable.

Hold function gives you accurate readings even if baby is moving about and the TARE function allows you to deduct the weight of a towel or any other items which you want to deduct during weighing, which is more accurate yet comfortable weight readings for you and baby.

With a 2.79 x 1.1 inch large LCD readout which is easy to read at any angle and the hold feature allows you to remove the baby from the scale while keeping the weight measurement lit for an additional 20 seconds.
The weight is displayed in steps of 5 g from a minimum weight of 50 g, the maximum weight is 20 kg, suitable for 0-2 years old baby.
On delivery the scale is set at “kg” units. The button ”kg/lb/oz“ allows you to switch at any time between kilograms units and pounds (lb) and ounces (oz).

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
